name: Radar Scanner
desc: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds .
notes:
Not to be confused with Radio Scanner, an interactable that unlocks Environment logs.
The Radar Scanner is an equipment in Risk of Rain 2. It is unlocked and starts appearing in runs after completing the Bookworm Challenge.
When activated, a holographic projection will quickly emanate from the player outward, marking every interactable within 500 meters with an icon for 10 seconds. 

Equipment Barrels, Radio Scanners, 3D Printers, Fans, the Broken REX in Abyssal Depths, the Scavenger's Sack, Void Cradles, and Void Potentials, are marked with .
Barrels and Stalks are marked with .
Shrines and Cleansing Pools are marked with .
Broken drones and turrets are marked with .
Chests, Dropped items, Lunar Coins, and Scrappers are marked with .
The Teleporter is marked with .
Lunar Pods, Newt Altars, Platforms, pressure plates (on Abandoned Aqueduct), Portals, and Deep Void Signals are marked with .


== Notes ==
Although this item covers a large radius, it is not infinite and some interactables may potentially be excluded from the scan depending on the player's position.


== Tips ==
  Equipment Drones can make good use of this item by drastically reducing the cooldown, allowing for much more frequent scans for players looking to speedily locate Chests, Shrines, Barrels, Drones, Items, Lunar Pods, and the Teleporter (pre-activation). The only caveat is that Equipment Drones do not use their equipment unless they are looking at an enemy.
This item can especially help to find the Rusty Lockbox for the  Rusted Key, or the Encrusted Cache for the  Encrusted Key.
